t: Those*pn who trust in the Lord*s are like Mount Zion, which*ld cannot be shaken but endures forever.
As*ln the mountains surround Jerusalem, so*ld the Lord*s surrounds his people both*ld now and forevermore.
The*pn scepter of the wicked will not remain over*ld the land allotted to the righteous, for*ln then the righteous might use their*ld hands to do evil.
Lord,*spn do good to those who are good, to*ld those who are upright in heart.
But*ln those who turn to crooked ways the*ld Lord*s will banish with the evildoers. Peace*pn be on Israel.
